import{Container}from'react-bootstrap';import NavbarC from'./component/NavbarC';import Hider from'./component/Hider';import Category from'./component/Category';import Cardse from'./component/Cardse';import'./App.css';import{items}from'./component/data';import{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){//to fetch data from array of data
const[itemsData,setItemData]=useState(items);//to creat a new array with non-recurring values

const filterbycategory=cat=>{if(cat==='الكل'){setItemData(items);}else{const newArr=items.filter(item=>item.category===cat);setItemData(newArr);}};//filter data by search
